basic_info.motto: Never give-up always positive. Do or do not, there is no try
basic_info.summary: Born in Cuba, lived there for 27 years. Living in USA since 2008, currently located in Miami. Bachelors in Telecommunications and Electronic since 2004 in East University, Santiago de Cuba, Cuba, Msc in Telecommunications and Networking at FIU in 2015, major in Wireless Communications. Currently working as Software System Developer for a Telecommunications Company, HQ in Belgium since 2015. Exposed to C#, WebAPIs, RestAPIs, javascript, jquery.

education.university: East University, Santiago de Cuba, Cuba

experiences.details: Integrating devices to a monitoring and management software (DataMiner) via C#, RestAPIs, SQL.
Worked with the IT Administrator creating backups, cheking the health of the entire network.
Developed a Desktop Application together with the CEO of the Company in C# 1.0

projects.intro: My Proyects at 4geeks academy, learning to code
